.pull-left[
#### Access
- 6F right radial
- 6F RCFA (antegrade) 
- JR4 and JL3.5 diagnostic
- 4F MP1 for peripherals

#### Interventions
- DSE of LE
- Wire escalation of CTO (Glidewire, Asahi, Corsair, Confianza, Turnpike LP, Astato)
- Spider filter wire
- Directional atherectomy (Hawk One)
- DCB
]

.pull-right[
#### Outcomes
- Historical revascularization of RCA CTO
- Successful atherectomy
- 6.0 x 12 mm DCB 
]
